titles: The seconde tragedie of Seneca entituled Thyestes faithfully Englished by Iasper Heywood fellowe of Alsolne College in Oxforde
author: Seneca, Lucius Annaeus, ca. 4 B.C.-65 A.D.
Heywood, Jasper, 1535-1598.
publisher: In Fletestrete in the hous late Thomas Berthelettes,
notes: The last two leaves are blank.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
